title: Blockchain Data Observability: When Your Data Pipeline Goes Offline
description: You're running a Solana trading bot that depends on real-time low-latency price feeds. Suddenly, your dashboard shows stale data from 5 minutes ago. Is it a network issue? An API problem? Your application crash? Or just Solana's network congestion? Without proper observability, you're flying blind which in crypto equals losing money.
